title: Infinix X3 80 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED Smart Android TV  (32X3)

product_specification.In The Box: 1U LED TV, 1U Remote Control, 2U Battery, 2U Base, 4U Screws, 1U User Manual, 1U Warranty Card, 1U Stand Installation
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MPEG, MPG, VOB, DAT, AVI, MP4, MOV, MKV, FLV, ASF, 3PG
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, M4A, WAV, RM, AC3, FLAC, OGG, AAC
product_specification.Content Providers: Google Play Store, Netflix, Prime Video, YouTube
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: 3.5mm Headphone Jack, AV in (RCA), LAN, Headphones, Coaxial Digital, Mini YPbPr, RJ45
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Anti Blue-ray Technology, HDR 10, HLG, Bezel-less Design, Built in Chromecast, 85% NTSC Color Gamut, Bluetooth 5.0, Dual Band Wi-Fi, BT Remote, 93% Screen to Body Ratio
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Any Damage Caused due to Improper Self-installation by Customer or Any Unauthorized Technician. Physical Damage, Dent, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Scratches due to Normal Wear and Tear. Damage Caused due to Natural Act of God, Fire, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Accident or Damage by Any External Force. Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable etc.) Any Damage Caused due to Tampering of the Product, Disassembly by Any Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void. Flipkart will facilitate Installation & Demo at time of your convenience from an authorized service engineer. The authorized service engineer will be providing detailed demo. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. The wall mount is not provided free of cost and is chargeable to the customer. The cost of wall mount is Rs. 399 (inclusive of applicable taxes) and will be available with service engineer for purchase. - Connecting with available power source - Connecting / Setting up various available input source for Audio Video based on model - Connecting with available wifi (for smart TV) - Checking TV for proper functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its features

product_description.Bezel-less Design: Designed with a 93% screen-to-body ratio, the Infinix 32X3 Android TV offers a wide and interruption-free view. Featuring a slim design with an optical distance as low as OD35, this TV is an aesthetically pleasing addition to your home. Moreover, it features a lightweight design for a truly bezel-less experience.
product_description.EPIC 3.0 Picture Engine: Sporting a sophisticated EPIC 3.0 Image engine with HDR and HLG support, this TV ensures enhanced colours, clarity, and contrast. It has a Full HD resolution and a bright display of up to 400 nits, which improves the entire viewing experience. Furthermore, this also features an NTSC colour gamut of 85%, which helps produce realistic and natural colours.

review: This tv is very nice,sleek design,good picture quality and dolbydts sound.this Infinex led tv is total value of money..must buy this product.i got its installation late but all other things is allright...this smart led is full of functions...thanks Flipkart.

Got this for 12k and absolutely loved it for that price,
Pros:
1. Remote is tiny and cute with no unnecessary buttons, also it supports Google voice assistant which is the best way to navigate smart TV's.
2. Picture quality is nice, dark shows good enough for an IPS panel, also the audio is clear and crisp, best for watching content/news etc.
3. Latest Android, 3 HDMI, Bluetooth 5 and wifi 6, what else does one need?
4. Delivery way inconvenient due to being late and the delivery agent being rude but the installation person was Swift and installed the tv within minutes.

Cons:
1. standby led is a bit too bright which is annoying in dark rooms, but this can easily by solved stick a white paper over the light using a transparent tape.
2. Bezels are actually bigger then what is shown is the product image, they have hidden the bezel behind the screen so basically there is no "slim" bezels compared to most other devices in the similar price range.

answers: A:Go to Settings -> Sound -> Dolby Audio Processing
A:It comes with Dolby audio which delivers true cinematic surround sound experience, whether you watching videos or listening to songs. 43" has 36W Quad speakers & 32" has 20W box speakers.

A:Plug in the pen drive in the USB of the TV. Then go the "Media Player" app in the TV and click on name of the drive to access its contents
